refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: omnibot_enable enables or disables &omni:name; module loading at game init time. When enabled, &project:name; will attempt to load the &omni:name; module. If the module is not found, a small error message will be logged indicating such, and &project:name; will continue to operate as if &omni:name; was disabled. If you do not wish to operate &omni:name; but wish to supress a loading attempt and subsequent error message, then disable this feature.

para.note: This CVAR should be set on the server command-line and not in a .cfg file.
